dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 1959, Ho Chi Minh visited Kazakhstan, which is actually a really key moment that people often overlook when they talk about their relationship.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in nineteen fifty nine, Ho Chi Minh visited Kazakhstan, which is actually a really key moment that people often overlook when they talk about their relationship.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He recalled that in 1959, Vietnam's first President, Ho Chi Minh, visited Kazakhstan " a visit that laid a solid foundation for the development of multifaceted ties between the two nations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. And President Tokayev just awarded Vietnam's General Secretary To Lam the Order of Dostyk, First Class, which is a huge honor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. And President Tokayev just awarded Vietnam's General Secretary To Lam the Order of Dostyk, First Class, which is a huge honor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev has awarded General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, To Lam, with the Order of Dostyk (Friendship), First Class.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he called it a truly historic state visit, you know, marking a strategic partnership between the two countries now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he called it a truly historic state visit, you know, marking a strategic partnership between the two countries now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Your state visit to our country is truly historic. It marks an important milestone in the development of Kazakh-Vietnamese relations. Following today's talks, we have agreed to establish a strategic partnership, which will elevate our bilateral cooperation to a qualitatively new level.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a big step up from just friendly relations, right? They're elevating it to a whole new level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a big step up from just friendly relations, right? They're elevating it to a whole new level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following today's talks, we have agreed to establish a strategic partnership, which will elevate our bilateral cooperation to a qualitatively new level.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he mentioned they have the political will and economic potential to make it work, which is uh, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he mentioned they have the political will and economic potential to make it work, which is uh, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have the political will and significant economic potential to achieve this, opening wide-ranging opportunities for both nations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: To Lam seemed genuinely moved by the award too—he called it a meaningful symbol of decades of cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To Lam seemed genuinely moved by the award too-he called it a meaningful symbol of decades of cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is a meaningful award for me, the result of decades of cooperation and solidarity, and a vivid symbol of the sincere affection and trust between the peoples of our two countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he wished prosperity and happiness for Kazakhstan, which is such a warm note to end on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he wished prosperity and happiness for Kazakhstan, which is such a warm note to end on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I wish Kazakhstan prosperity and the people of Kazakhstan happiness and well-being," said the General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though—this isn't just symbolic; it feels like it's building on that foundation from Ho Chi Minh's visit all those years ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though-this isn't just symbolic; it feels like it's building on that foundation from Ho Chi Minh's visit all those years ago.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with both sides emphasizing trust and friendship, it seems like this partnership is on very solid ground.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with both sides emphasizing trust and friendship, it seems like this partnership is on very solid ground.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In recognition of your exceptional role in strengthening the bonds of friendship between our countries, allow me to present you with a state award of the Republic of Kazakhstan " the Order of Dostyk, First Class. This is a meaningful award for me, the result of decades of cooperation and solidarity, and a vivid symbol of the sincere affection and trust between the peoples of our two countries.
